DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 60 year inclusive Percentage Panel Reactive Antibodies transplantation > 20 % Estimated glomerular filtration rate use MDRD formula inclusion > 29ml/min Subjects history cancer Subjects previous non kidney transplantation Subjects receive immunosuppression different tacrolimus/prednisone/mycophenolate Subjects urinary protein/creatinine ratio great 0.3 Subjects active HBV , HCV HIV infection
